Message: The user completes the submission of the form

I'm sorry to hear that your ads got rejected. There can be various reasons for ad rejection, such as incorrect conversion tracking setup or typographical errors. You should have received an email from Ad Support with the subject line ‘Urgent: Ad Rejected - Action Required,’ detailing the specific reason for rejection. Please review the reject reason carefully and address that specific issue. Once you've made the necessary revisions, you can resubmit your ad by saving it again.
If you believe your ad complies with the policies or if the rejection was a misunderstanding, you can submit an appeal by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com.
For more detailed guidance, please check out this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next). Let me know if you need further assistance!

they got rejected because of this:
Your ad contains unappealing images, such as close-ups, images intended to shock, or images intended to elicit strong negative emotions, in violation of our Advertising Policy. Please use other images.

It looks like your ad was rejected due to the use of images that violate NewsBreak's Advertising Policy. To resolve this, you'll need to replace the current images with ones that are more appealing and do not elicit strong negative emotions or shock. Once you've updated the images, you can resubmit your ad.
For more information on our Ad Policy and guidelines, please refer to this article: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
